comment.author: 13415286@N00
comment._content: Wonderful! Thanks for the link to the history of the colors. I visited this house about every week when I was a kid. I can't wait to see the new installation!

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: We are pretty excited to have it back.  A lot of visitors have been asking about it during these years.  In the coming weeks we will have a few more blog posts. Lisa is going to do a few more to cover some additional conservation issues.  Also, new web pages about the house will be launching in the next month, including a Google map mash-up and a timeline.  ~shelley
